author: mpoeschl
msg: remove log as it is unused

author: jmcnally
msg: * src/java/org/apache/torque/util/BasePeer.java -
replace null Connection checks wrapping
Transaction.rollback with Transaction.safeRollback.
* src/java/org/apache/torque/util/Transaction.java - rollback method changed
to throw TorqueException instead of NPE when Connection is null.
safeRollback method changed to log null Connection at debug level, since it
is a normal event. Lowered other exception logging to warn level since
safeRollback should not be called if a failed rollback is considered a
serious error.

author: jmcnally
msg: Modified Files:
* src/java/org/apache/torque/util/BasePeer.java - replace null Connection
checks wrapping Transaction.rollback with Transaction.safeRollback.
* src/java/org/apache/torque/util/Transaction.java - rollback method changed
to throw TorqueException instead of NPE when Connection is null.
safeRollback method changed to log null Connection at debug level, since
it is a normal event. Lowered other exception logging to warn level
since safeRollback should not be called if a failed rollback is considered
a serious error.

author: mpoeschl
msg: TRQS51: Datadump does not recognize null columns properly
